}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "2976450101" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The USB ID used in this entry is per '''[[ZyXEL]]''''s driver set for the [[ZyXEL NWD6505‎]].
==Links of Interest== ===Vendor links=== [http://www.amazon.co.jp/BUFFALO-300Mbps-USB2-0%E7%94%A8-%E7%84%A1%E7%B7%9ALAN%E5%AD%90%E6%A9%9F-WI-U2-300D/dp/B00D696KQA On '''amazon.com.jp'''] :ASIN: B00D696KQA, First available on: 2013-06-05, Price (as of 2013-08-16): ￥ 2,709 (~ 27.77 USD)
